label.description: Coordonnées indiquant la localisation de l'élément

label.name: Library of Congress Names Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Geographic Areas Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Date
label.description: This element identifies and records the date(s) that pertain to the creation, assembly, accumulation, and/or maintenance and use of the materials being described.

label.name: Extent
label.description: This element indicates the extent and the physical nature of the materials being described.

label.name: Administrative/Biographical History Element
label.description: A description of the context in which the materials being described were created, assembled, and/or maintained is as important as the description of the materials themselves

label.name: Scope and Content
label.description: This element provides information about the nature of the materials and activities reflected in the unit being described to enable users to judge its potential relevance.

label.name: System of Arrangement
label.description: This element identifies the various aggregations of archival materials, their relationships, or the sequence of documents within them.

label.name: Conditions Governing Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to the nature of the information in the materials being described, such as those imposed by the donor, by the repository, or by statutory/regulatory requirements.

label.name: Physical Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any physical characteristics or storage locations that limit, restrict, delay, or otherwise affect access to the materials being described.

label.name: Technical Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any technical requirements restrict or otherwise affect access to the materials being described, such as equipment or specific hardware/software required for use.

label.name: Conditions Governing Reproduction
label.description: This element identifies any restrictions on reproduction due to copyright or other reasons, as well as restrictions on further use of the materials being described, such as publication after access has been provided.

label.name: Languages and Scripts on the Material
label.description: This element identifies the language(s), script(s), and symbol systems employed in the materials being described, particularly as they may affect its use.

label.name: Other Finding Aids
label.description: This element identifies any other finding aids to the materials being described particularly if they are available to the user, and provides information about the form and content of those finding aids.

label.name: Existence and Location of Originals
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of originals when the materials being described consist of copies, and the originals are not held by the repository

label.name: Existence and Location of Copies
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of copies or other reproductions of the materials being described when they are available for use in an institution, or for loan or purchase, or available electronically. Do not mention copies in private hands or copies made for personal use.

label.name: Publication Note
label.description: This element identifies any publications that are about or are based on the use, study, or analysis of the materials being described.

label.name: Processing Information
label.description: Provide information about actions of the archivist, custodians, or creators of the records or conventions in the finding aid that may have an impact on a researcher’s interpretation of the records or understanding of the information provided in the finding aid. Actions and conventions include but are not limited to reconstruction of provenance, maintenance, reconstruction, or alteration of original order, devising titles for materials, weeding, and maintenance or provision of control numbers or container numbers.

label.name: Preferred Citation
label.description: Indicate the preferred style for the citation of the unit being described.

label.name: Custodial History
label.description: This element provides information on changes of ownership or custody of the material being described, from the time it left the possession of the creator until it was acquired by the repository that is significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

label.name: Immediate Source of Acquisition
label.description: Record information about changes of ownership or custody of the materials being described that do not involve direct acquisition by the repository and that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation in the Custodial History Element.

label.name: Appraisal, Destruction, and Scheduling Information
label.description: This element provides information about the rationale for appraisal decisions, destruction actions, and disposition schedules that are relevant to the understanding and use of the materials being described.

label.name: Accruals
label.description: This element informs the user of anticipated additions to the unit being described. An accrual is an acquisition of archival materials additional to that already in the custody of the repository.

label.name: General notes
label.description: Record, as needed, information not accommodated by any of the defined elements of description.

label.name: Related Archival Materials
label.description: This element indicates the existence and location of archival materials that are closely related to the materials being described by provenance, sphere of activity, or subject matter, either in the same repository, in other repositories, or elsewhere.

label.name: Repository
label.description: This element identifies the name and location of the repository that hold the materials being described.

label.name: Cleaning/Coating Types/Recoating and Functions for maintenance

settings.setting: Vedettes matières de la Bibliothèque du Congrès
